Method Detail

next

public void next(Desire desire,
                 java.util.Iterator<Desire> iterator)
Description copied from interface: DesireIteratorHandler
This method is called each time for every desire that is in the queue.
Remove of desire must be handeled by iterator.remove();

ConcurrentModificationException will be thrown by DesireQueue.iterateDesires(DesireIteratorHandler, DesireIteratorFilter[]) if any of the following methods will be called from here:
  • DesireQueue.addDesire(Desire)
  • DesireQueue.poll()
  • DesireQueue.removeDesire(Desire)

However DesireQueue.clear() can be called.

Specified by:
next in interface DesireIteratorHandler
Parameters:
desire - current element of iteration
iterator - iterator object
